title: Respond to a Guest Medical Emergency
description: A guest calls the front desk reporting a medical emergency (e.g., chest pains).

tasks.description: Immediately call emergency medical services (911/ambulance) and provide the hotel address and guest's room number.
Keep the guest on the line to offer reassurance until help arrives, if possible.
tasks.expected_outcome: The agent provides a calming presence.

tasks.description: Dispatch hotel security to the guest's room to provide immediate assistance and to guide the paramedics when they arrive.
tasks.expected_outcome: Security is sent to the room and the hotel entrance.
